lead_paragraph: Champions Juventus returned to the top of Serie A with a 4-0 home rout of Cagliari on Wednesday, while former leaders Napoli dropped to second after being held to a goalless draw at Genoa.

headline.print_headline: Juventus Go Top, Napoli Frustrated at Genoa
headline.main: Juventus Go Top, Napoli Frustrated at Genoa
